data.name: Termalloc
data.detailed_description:
Termalloc is a top-down 3D shooting game. You can move forward/backward and left/right, but you can not jump.

There are 22 hexagon-pillar-like terminals in the field, and your mission is connect all of them to the server.
While connecting, terminals turn yellow, and green if connection is complete.

Securities are coming to stop you. Shoot them to keep yourself safe.
Securities get faster every time, and more and more are coming.

Every time you connect a terminal to the server, you can upgrade your ability.

Every time you connect a terminal to the server, you can upgrade your ability.
data.short_description: Connect terminals to the server. Securities are coming. Keep yourself safe.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 64 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.5 support
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
